response.summary: Industrial engineer with two years of experience in data visualization, forecasting model development and text analysis. I am proficient in R, SQL, Python and advanced Excel. I am interested in learning machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques in a friendly environment.
response.skills: Google Data Studio, Pronóstico, SQL, PostgreSQL, Programación, Análisis de datos, Análisis de textos, R Shiny, Gestión de proyectos, Vigilancia tecnológica, Mejora de procesos, Comunicación, Ingeniería, Ciencia de datos, Estadística, Procesamiento de grandes volúmenes de datos, R, Trabajo creativo, Trabajo en equipo, Integración de equipos

profile_positions.description: Extract and analyze historical sales information in order to generate forecasts influenced by discounts and market trends. As a complementary activity; investigate forecasting techniques to automate the company's current processes.
profile_positions.title: Demand planning analyst SR

profile_positions.description: I conducted research within the Society, Economy and Productivity group (SEPRO) with the objective of improving or designing processes in governmental entities such as: Colombia Productiva, 4-72 and the District Secretariat of Environment. The above through technological surveillance techniques, simulation and/or benchmarking.
profile_positions.title: Project assistant

profile_positions.description: Developed visualization tools in the Shiny library as input for public policy formulations such as ICT and SDGs. Implemented methods and techniques in text analysis and similarity to group CONPES according to their objective.
profile_positions.title: Data Science Intern

company.name: BCG X
company.description:
BCG X is the tech build & design unit of BCG.  

Turbocharging BCG’s deep industry and functional expertise, BCG X brings together advanced tech knowledge and ambitious entrepreneurship to help organizations enable innovation at scale.  

With nearly 3,000 technologists, scientists, programmers, engineers, and human-centered designers located across 80+ cities, BCG X builds and designs platforms and software to address the world’s most important challenges and opportunities.  

Teaming across our practices, and in close collaboration with our clients, our end-to-end global team unlocks new possibilities. Together we’re creating the bold and disruptive products, services, and businesses of tomorrow.
